name: Hemodialysis
title: Hemodialysis
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the administration of hemodialysis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with the administration of hemodialysis.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
